Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the weight of the bullfrog by stating it weighs 13 pounds when the largest American Bullfrogs typically weigh about 1.5 pounds.
Understate: The claim understates the actual size of the bullfrog by using forced perspective in the photograph to make it appear larger than it actually is.
Lack enough support: The claim does not provide enough evidence or support to prove the accuracy of the 13-pound weight claim for the bullfrog.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photograph accurately depicts a 13-pound bullfrog without considering alternative explanations or possibilities.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert suggests an alternative explanation for the size of the bullfrog in the photograph, stating that forced perspective was used to make it appear larger.
